summary: Adds new female follower inspired by Ezio from AC2
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/0b/18/0b1883aac87f7d5914dcf217553ea129.png[/img]

[img]http://jpegshare.net/images/17/f0/17f043dad8fe714e2802df2e121aff0d.png[/img]
[font=Kalinga][size=3]As a huge Assassin's Creed fan, I decided to make a character like Ezio in my Skyrim. Also I chose to make a female version of him. I decided to make it this way because I like character genderbend and I like making characters from one games in another games :D So if you're also an AC fan and want to bring something inspired by this series to your Skyrim - Ezia is good choice for you :)[/size]

[i][color=#cccccc][size=2]Please note: this follower is a reference to the particular character (Ezio) so it means that it will look the way I created it. That's why she is standalone and with her particular Assassin's Creed themed outfit. Also I will not make any other versions with moving boobs, makeuped face textures and so on. She is not another one smexy anime waifu and not intended to wear chainmail bikinis, dresses, etc.[/size][/color][/i]

[size=3][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/0d/af/0dafa7abb08cd204660e1154354d1924.png[/img][/size]
[size=3]- Fully standalone follower: includes body, textures, hair and outfit
- High poly head[/size]
[size=3]- The outfit is retextured[/size]
[size=3]- Hand-drawn assassin's lip scar[/size]
[size=3]- Scripted hood equip[/size]
[size=3]- Marriageable and essential[/size]
[size=3]- Compatible with follower framework overhaul mods[/size]

[size=3][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/e2/57/e257e54cac0c6dded8fe7bde07ecf3d8.png[/img][/size]
[size=3]Ezia will have same level as main character and level up with you. She has bunch of useful perks on one-handed weapons, light armor, stealth, lockpicking and magic resistance. Focused on dual swords and light armor (don't know how it works in vanilla game, but in my game with Ultimate Follower Overhaul mod she uses both her swords in combat). She may be not very suitable for low-level characters (under 10 lvl for example) and on low difficulty level of the game, but is quite fine for higher difficulty levels.[/size] [size=3]Ezia automatically equips her hood outdoors and unequips indoors. If you want to take screenshots without hood or something, you may just take it out from her inventory. The hood will respawn. [/size]

[size=3][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/da/f6/daf6e7fed042c422c4e82e32d4801280.png[/img][/size]
[size=3]Just unpack the archive and place files to your Data folder, replace if prompted and activate Ezia.esp in the game launcher. You may find Ezia hanging around in The Ragged Flagon (Riften), she will join you for free.[/size][/font][/center][center][font=Kalinga][size=3][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/55/d1/55d132874178fb25a59bc0ef0bf09bf2.png[/img][/size]
[size=3][color=#e06666]v.1.0[/color] - File released, fully standalone.[/size]
[size=3][color=#e06666]v.1.1[/color] - Added Real Girls textures.
[color=#e06666]v.1.2[/color] - Added script for hood auto equip.
[color=#e06666]v.1.3[/color] - Added UNP body.
[color=#e06666]v.1.4[/color] - Added high poly head, changed eyes texture.
[color=#e06666]v.1.5[/color] - Added new specular maps.[/size]

[img]http://jpegshare.net/images/db/20/db20e003cde984058e65356e01916db8.png[/img]
